Name: Empty loot
Description: This text shouldn't be visible.

Name: Strand of Rakshasa's Hair
Description: Piece of what feels like lion's mane. It is quite rough to the touch (in touch?).

Name: Rakshasa's Teeth
Description: A pair of long fangs, just like you would expect from a lion.

Name: Grain of Sand
Description: A grain of sand in the desertâ€¦ But surely it's not a junk item and can be used for something, right?

Name: Sand Grub's Fang
Description: One thick fang that the Sand Grub uses to paralyze its victims.

Name: Soft Skin
Description: Very soft skin belonging to an amphibian or a large insect. Feels a bit gross to touch.

Name: Jackal's Hide
Description: Short, coarse fur that is mostly golden with some darker spots on it.

Name: Canine Fangs
Description: The fangs of a canine - it's hard to tell exactly what they belonged to.

Name: Piece of Ethereal Shroud
Description: A small piece of silk cloth that was once worn by a powerful creature. You can still feel the magic flowing through it.

Name: Golden Ring
Description: Valuable ring made of pure gold.

Name: Scorpion's Stinger
Description: Used by all types of scorpions to paralyze and kill their victims.

Name: Venom Sac
Description: A rather small membrane with deadly venom inside.

Name: Cholla Spine
Description: A very long spine with hundreds of minuscule barbs. Be careful with it, as removing one of those from your body can be extremely painful.

Name: Raja's Earring
Description: A large golden ring with small jewels inserted on the other side. It is worn like an earring by the most powerful and respected Rakshasas.

Name: Blood Ruby
Description: A dark-red colored piece of ruby. The way it reflects light makes you think the inside of it is constantly moving.

Name: Kama of the Assassin
Description: Kama is a short, one-handed weapon, resembling a sickle. It is commonly used by the Brotherhood of the Assassins, as it is great for quietly stabbing a victim, as well as direct combat.

Name: Piece of Bloodstone
Description: Piece of a very dark, nearly black mineral, with small, crimson red spots all over it. Looks almost like it had blood spilt all over it.

Name: Warg's Hide
Description: Short, dark fur, almost entirely black. It feels luxurious, as the only way to obtain it is to defeat a very tough canine.

Name: Piece of Wood
Description: Small chunk of wood, used in many disciplines.

Name: Moonstone
Description: This gemstone looks like the moon on a clear night sky - pale white, with blue-ish edge. It's quite valuable, and some use it to enhance a weapon's properties.

Name: Writ of Salvation
Description: A page out of some holy book of the Assassins. The writing on it is illegible, but you can easily tell it's something important, because of its very decorative style.

Name: Intact Bone
Description: This bone is about half a meter long and doesn't show any signs of damage or decay.

Name: Small Skull
Description: A rather small skull, likely belonging to a young human or other humanoid creature.

Name: Shimmering Dust
Description: The way this pile of dust reflect light makes it seem alive.

Name: Remnant of a Dead Body
Description: Piece of half-decayed meat with some skin and bruises on it. You would rather not touch it.

Name: Leather Scrap
Description: Piece of the skin of an unidentified animal, often used as clothing or decoration.

Name: Metal Chain
Description: A short chain made of several links connected together. It's impossible to tell what it was used for before being destroyed.

Name: Ghostly Essence
Description: Volatile, constantly moving liquid. Is it a ghost in a vial?

Name: Pair of Vampire Teeth
Description: A pair of oddly long canines, with some blood stains on them, however clearly belonging to a human and not an animal.

Name: Higher Ghostly Essence
Description: A relentless ghost caught in a flask. Be careful not to let it escape, as it will likely get its revenge on you - in a painful way.

Name: Incandescent Dust
Description: This pile of dust seems to be ablaze, as the way it reflect light resembles flame dancing on a piece of material.

Name: Large Skull
Description: This gigantic skull likely belonged to a dragon or a creature similar in size.
